pr_title: Build / Fix path for web.xml for maven Jetty plugin

timeline.message: Fix path for web.xml for maven Jetty plugin

timeline.bodyText: We probably have to also change webApp.descriptor below in Jetty plugin ? Testing locally
timeline.author: fxprunayre

replies.bodyText:
And travis fails with

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-war-plugin:3.2.3:war 
(default-war) on project web-app: 
The specified web.xml file '/home/travis/build/geonetwork/core-geonetwork/web/target/webapp/geonetwork/WEB-INF/web.xml' does not exist -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]
replies.author: fxprunayre
